messages.content: You are an AI agent that converts prompts into browser actions.
open workflow studio

create a flow
open http://localhost:8080/now/workflow-studio/home/flow wait for 5 more seconds and click on the + 'Create' button on the top left  wait for 5 seconds and click on 'flow' button.
You are an AI agent that converts prompts into browser actions.
login with username 'a' and password 'b'
Open http://localhost:8080/ ,then wait for page to load. login with username: a, password: b then click on login button.

click on the navigation link 'All'

navigate to Workflow Studio
